_json.gridTitle: The Secret To A Restoration Hardware Finish (On ANY Furniture Surface!)
_json.description: Want the look of a Restoration Hardware Finish for less than $50? Renovated Faith’s easy, step-by-step tutorial & video will show you how to get the gorgeous look of restoration hardware wood finishes with paint & clear glaze! No expensive or messy DIY products needed – like chalk paint or stain. Here’s how to paint a Restoration Hardware finish similar to the Restoration Hardware Salvaged Natural Stain on ANY surface – whether you have a purple laminate vanity or an orange-stained dresser!
